Related Character(s): 鏝
Связанный символ (и): 鏝

槾字的基本解释

槾
màn
抹子，泥工的一种抹墙工具。
贪。
古书上说的一种树。
木脂。
屋檐。

槾
wàn
古书上说的一种荆类植物。

槾字的汉语字典释义
暂无汉字(槾)的汉语大字典的解释
槾字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槾； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页548第15
【唐韻】母官切【集韻】【正韻】謨官切，?音瞞。【說文】?也。【玉篇】所以塗也。秦謂之?，關東謂之槾。　又【博雅】槾，貪也。　又【釋名】㭒謂之槾。槾，綿也，綿連榱頭，使齊平也。　又【正韻】莫半切，音縵。義同。　又木名。【張衡·南都賦】其木則槾柏杻橿。【註】槾，荆也。　又【集韻】模元切，音璊。與樠同。　又【集韻】無販切，音萬。亦槾荆也。

槾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
槾字的起名意思

暂无。

tree
Basic explanation of words
tree
màn
Trowel, a tool for plastering walls of masons.
greedy.
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
Wood fat.
eaves.
tree
wàn
A kind of wattle plant mentioned in ancient books.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　槾; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 548 15
[Tang Yun] Mother official cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Mo official cut,? Yin concealed. [Said the text]? Also. [Jade articles] So it is painted. Qin called it?, Kanto called it Li.　[Bo Ya] Li, greedy.　 [Release the name] 㭒 That is the 槾. Li, Mian Ye, continual river head, make Qi Ping Ye.　[Zheng Yun] Do not cut half, Yinman. The same meaning.　Also wooden name. 【Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu】Its wood is Li Bai and Bai Xiao Liao. [Note] Li, Jing Ye.　[Jiyun] Modular cut, sound applause. Same as 樠.　[Jiyun] No sales, thousands of sounds. Yi Li Jing also.
